attributes.action: Deploy the ROYAL NAVY in the ENGLISH CHANNEL to stop ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS.
attributes.additional_details:
All our infrastructure is at breaking point, SCHOOLS,  NHS, HOUSING .
We can no longer subsidise  ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS who have no right to be here.
The BRITISH  PEOPLE democraticly voted for BREXIT to stop the influx of EU MIGRANTS only for the BRITISH GOVERNMENT to be incapable of controlling the flood of ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS.
attributes.background: Deploy the ROYAL NAVY in the ENGLISH CHANNEL to prevent ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS from entering BRITISH WATERS. Turn them back using whatever means necessary or escort them back to FRANCE.

rejection.details:
The Ministry of Defence has already taken primacy for the UK's operational response to small boat migration in the English Channel. Decisions about what to do in the event of identifying a small boat in or approaching UK waters is an operational matter for the Royal Navy.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter UK across the Channel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744
